translations: v.逐渐削弱（损害）；故意破坏（某人）的形象（或威信）；在……下面挖，（尤指）从根基处损坏

phrs.translation: 破坏, 暗中破坏, 危害
破坏社会稳定, 损坏社会稳固
破环当地文化, 破坏当地文化
破坏权威, 破坏威信
暗中破坏, 破坏, 侵蚀…的基础, 逐渐削弱

sentences.sentence: He accused me of slandering him and trying to undermine his position.
sentences.translation: 他指控我诽谤他并想削弱他的地位。

sentences.sentence: The prosecution did its best to undermine the credibility of the witness.
sentences.translation: 原告竭力削弱证人的可信性。

sentences.sentence: The continued fighting threatens to undermine efforts to negotiate an agreement.
sentences.translation: 持续的战斗有可能破坏通过谈判达成协议的努力。
